name: fyxed-wonen
description: Property rental platform inspired by HuurGenie

scripts.setup: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.scrape:mixed:big5: SCRAPER_OBEY=0 SCRAPER_LOG=DEBUG SCRAPER_SOURCES=pararius,kamernet SCRAPER_CITIES=Amsterdam,Utrecht,Rotterdam,'Den Haag',Eindhoven SCRAPER_MAX=25 bash scraper/start.sh
scripts.scrape:pararius:big5: SCRAPER_LOG=DEBUG SCRAPER_SOURCES=pararius SCRAPER_CITIES=Amsterdam,Utrecht,Rotterdam,'Den Haag',Eindhoven SCRAPER_MAX=25 bash scraper/start.sh
scripts.scrape:kamernet:big5: SCRAPER_OBEY=0 SCRAPER_LOG=DEBUG SCRAPER_SOURCES=kamernet SCRAPER_CITIES=Amsterdam,Utrecht,Rotterdam,'Den Haag',Eindhoven SCRAPER_MAX=25 bash scraper/start.sh

author: Fyxed Wonen
